title: Loadingscreen Border
body:
Hello
I have a question about the ingameborder.
I was Gold1 about 1 day ago...
Now i have a rly bad time with a large losing streak.
Do i get the Gold 1 Border or the current rank (for exp. Gold 5)?
Kind regards!

replies.body: I believe the one you get is determined by what you end the season at. That'll be current rank when the season ends.
